bug.author: tvst
bug.summary: Small visual issue: icons not centered in buttons
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Start any Streamlit app that has a sidebar Hover over the hamburger menu. You'll see this:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/690814/102125679-e7825d00-3dfe-11eb-9975-1f974f552275.png></denchmark-link>
Hover over the sidebar expand/collapse button. You'll see this:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/690814/102125766-008b0e00-3dff-11eb-899e-7558ad83055d.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
The icons should be horizontally and vertically centered in the button boundaries. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
The icons should be horizontally centered but not vertically centered. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
yes <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.71/0

comments.comment: Closing as 0.72 seems to fix this.
